title: Harold H. Bruff Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide general scholarship support  at the University of Colorado Law School in honor of Harold H. Bruff, former Dean of the Law School.  The selection of recipients will be made by the School Financial Aid Committee.
marketingContent: To provide general scholarship support  at the University of Colorado Law School in honor of Harold H. Bruff, former Dean of the Law School.  The selection of recipients will be made by the School Financial Aid Committee.
